mediaDisplay.text: 1. Press "Menu" on the remote to display the main menu. 2. Use the arrow keys on the remote to highlight "Movies" in the menu and press "OK" on the remote. The Movies screen displays the movies available on the media player. 3. Use the arrow keys to browse through your movie lists and select a movie. - OR - Press "Menu" again to display the menu, select "Search", and press "OK" to search a specific movie. 4. When you’ve selected the movie you want to watch, press the Play button on the remote. 5. Press "Menu" again while a movie is playing to display the menu options for this movie. * DVD Menu: If you’re playing a DVD, display the menu on that DVD. * Subtitles: Select a subtitle language or turn subtitles off. * Audio Options: Select the correct audio language and format option for your TV. 6. Press "Info" on the remote to display the movie title, running time, and progress bar. 7. Press the "Volume" + and - keys on the remote to adjust the sound. 8. Press the "Zoom" + and - keys on the remote to adjust the picture size.
